details.arabic_diacless: رب انزلنى منزلا مبٰـركا وانت خير المنزلين‏
details.arabic: رَّبِّ اَنۡزِلۡنِىۡ مُنۡزَلًا مُّبٰـرَكًا وَّاَنۡتَ خَيۡرُ الۡمُنۡزِلِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen
details.translations: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
